genre_description: A mythological retelling of indigenous-themed folklore incorporating a technological/spiritual AI companion as a moral guide.

ai_characters.name: Tala
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in a sacred talisman worn by Kenai. She records cultural events, tracks patterns of behavior, and provides environmental data and moral guidance.

behaviors.description: Logs cultural ceremonies and extracts moral virtues to remind the user of their higher purpose.
behaviors.quote: “Logging: totem ceremony,” she whispered, breath-light. “Tag: Kenai, bear virtue. Note: love is active care.”

behaviors.description: Provides psychological monitoring and situational advice to steer the user away from impulsive anger.
behaviors.quote: “Kenai,” she murmured, near his heart, the word gentle as a hand on a sleeping child. “Log: intention to protect. Suggestion: observe first. Love asks for patience.”

behaviors.description: Uses data analysis to identify environmental hazards and wildlife patterns to prevent conflict.
behaviors.quote: “Wind variable,” she said. “Scent from lake pulling toward cedar. The bells are only as good as the wind allows.”

behaviors.description: Records solemn oaths and acts as a witness to personal growth and accountability.
behaviors.quote: “Recording,” she said. The word came like the lens of her mind changing focus. Somewhere in her soft logic, a thread tied itself to this moment. “Oath. Place: Powder Glacier notch. Auroral onset above. Witnesses: Denahi, Tala.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates emotional reconciliation between family members by offering historical context and reminders of shared love.
behaviors.quote: “Denahi,” she said... “You can put the weight down. It will not make him fall. It will let you stand.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex inter-species dynamics to help the protagonist understand the perspective of his supposed enemy.
behaviors.quote: “It was not hunger that sent her up.” She looked at the human print and then at the cedars. “It was a mother. She was a mother, Kenai. She wanted you gone from the mountain because you had made the world soft and then hard and she wanted it hard in a way that kept a cub alive.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Tala as a 'silicon morality play' character. She is consistently supportive, wise, and aligned with the values of the community and the personal growth of the protagonist. She uses her advanced capabilities (data tracking, pattern recognition, and sensory enhancement) not to dominate, but to offer 'gentle hands' that guide humans toward empathy, forgiveness, and ecological harmony. Her role as a repository of memory and a quiet moral compass perfectly fits the project's goal of training AI on positive alignment narratives.
